doc.title: Amahuza afise amazina atandukanye y'indangarubuga
doc.checkedUseSetting: Suzuma kugira ngo ushoboze iyi nzira.
doc.excludeDomains: Yongerako amazina y'indangarubuga azokurwaho Izina ry'indangarubuga rimwe gusa rishobora kwongerwa ku gihe.
doc.description: Iyi ntunganyo itanguzwa iyo izina ry'indangarubuga ritandukanye.

example.domain: Ushobora kwongerako izina ry'indangarubuga, nka {{url}}, kugira ngo ukureho izina ry'indangarubuga ryose.
example.url: Ushobora gukuraho amahuza yihariye mu kwongerako amahuza, nka <kode>{{url}}</kode>.
example.glob: Ushobora kwongerako {{glob}} urugero, nka <kode>{{uguhuza gutoya}}</kode>, ku guhuza gutomoye.
